item.title: How “Broad” is This Market Recovery Really?
item.description: Hey, it's Ross Givens here with the Chart of the Day. The Nasdaq may still be 4% off its previous highs, but the Equal-Weighted S&P 500 – which downplays the impact of mega-cap tech – already broke through its highs this week. The Russell 3000, covering nearly all U.S. stocks, is also just 1% away from a new peak. This recovery is wider than most people realize. Don’t sit on the sidelines and miss out. The post How “Broad” is This Market Recovery Really? appeared first on Stock Surge Daily .

item.title: Don’t Listen to the Perma-Bears
item.description: Hey, it's Ross Givens here with the Chart of the Day. Today’s chart highlights the Volatility Index (VIX), which has settled back to levels last seen at the end of July after a sharp spike earlier this month. While it’s still slightly elevated compared to the average during this bull market, it’s inching closer to a point that could signal smoother sailing ahead. Is this an “all clear” for the bull market? Not necessarily – but it’s a positive sign. Don’t miss out on this potential recovery. The post Don’t Listen to the Perma-Bears appeared first on Stock Surge Daily .
